name: The Heroic Battle
description:
The Heroic Battle is 2D shooter multiplayer online game where you have to face other players in a procedurally generated world fully destrutible !

The goal of the game is simple: to make the most kill! Different game modes are available: each for yourself, team match.

Different classes of players are available. Each have their own advantage and disadvantages.

You have 3 different weapons: a melee weapon, a weapon for projectiles, a grenade launcher and / or a magic weapon.

Warning !

This game is no under development ! This is the problem with multiplayer games : to remain playable, it is necessary to continue to make updates regularly.

Update v0.2.1 !

What's new in this update ?

  • New projectile particle system ! Much more better than just a simple sprite !
  • Lot's of bug fixed !

Update v0.2.2 !

What's new in this update ?

  • Key configuration
  • It is possible to change class only after you have died
  • Reduction in the number of bonuses on the map
  • The grenades exploded time was reduced from 4 seconds to 2 seconds
  • It is no longer possible to leave the lobby before a game starts
  • Lot's of bug fixed !
